CodeplexIssue.Title: Addin suddenly not loaded
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml:
Hi, i had made my plugin for Word with netoffice 1.7.3 and compile it. Most times it start allright and i can select my Plugin and enable it but now Word didn´t Show me the plugin... I had registered it manually like in the docs with the right regasm Version but i didn´t see the plugin....
I use Word 2013 64 Bit and Visual Studio 2013 and i compile the solution again .net 4.5
